website_summaries.verdict: Full length and Luon fabric makes these a comfortable and versatile choice.
pros: Double as workout leggings or everyday wear

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing. Authentic product?
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these, listed in two different color of blue on two different occasions in the same size but they both arrived the same exact color. One pair is shorter in the rise than the other. Also one has pulled threads. They cost more than the Lulu store pants so I assumed they were real but I'm not so sure.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Real lulu?
customer_reviews.text: I did like how these pants look and fit however why is the size dot different from lulu lemons size dot ? There size dot has words going going around a smaller size and lululemon just has a larger actual size on size dot ? I checked all my lululemon’s including ones from same style and color and the size dot is different so I’m wondering why ? How ?are the real lulu?
customer_reviews.author: Lenab

customer_reviews.title: Short return timeframe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a christmas present in October to make sure i could get one before they sold out but now am unable to exchange it for a new size when opened on Christmas Morning because to much time has passed. They should let you know there is only a small time frame to exchange. So now i have a pair of leggings that do not fit and need to order another pair for my daughters Christmas present replacement. I guess i will check more closely in the future.
customer_reviews.author: mobella

customer_reviews.title: Love them anyways
customer_reviews.text: Love these leggings although I thought these were normal lulu leggings not the Under ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love these leggings! You can not see through them and they don’t roll down at the waist like other cheaper brands. They didn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Joe J.

customer_reviews.title: Just yoga pants. Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing that sets these pants aprt from all the other, less expensive, yoga pants. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: G.Dan

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for many activities
customer_reviews.text: Great soft fabric. The fit is good and they're so cozy for lounging, but not too hot exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my wife
customer_reviews.text: She liked the pants and appreciated the full length. Also they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Canuso

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! expensive but so worth it, this is my second pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome leggings, love the fabric and super comfortable for high intensity exercises
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed, I ordered a size 2 and got a ...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, I ordered a size 2 and got a 6. The pants are really cute but I will not be ordering from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the style she wanted (short waist). Received the correct style (long waisted) and she wears it continually.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: KNOCKOFFS
customer_reviews.text: My daughter returned these @ her mall & the nice lady behind counter said they were knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne L.

customer_reviews.title: Had to pay $7. 50 to return- never worn ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to pay $7.50 to return- never worn or used. We are Amazon Prime & lost $7.50 also do not believe these are real LuluLemon at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Howlett

customer_reviews.title: regrettable purchase
customer_reviews.text: expected better value for the price. wear visible after 2 months of casual usage.
customer_reviews.author: transcend

product_meta.title: Lululemon Wunder Under Pant III Full On Luon Yoga Pants
feature_bullets: These no-fuss pants were designed to fit like a second skin—perfect for yoga or the gym.

Lululemon created these pants out of cottony-soft and supportive Luon fabric to be a no-fuss tight for our yoga practice and beyond. The second-skin fit makes it easy to check our alignment mid-pose and tucks easily into our boots when we're going straight from Hatha class to happy hour. Luon fabric is sweat-wicking and four-way stretch. Added LYCRA fibre moves with you and stays in great shape.
Tight fit is great for checking your alignment in the mirror. Wide, soft waistband is designed to eliminate muffin top.
Stash your keys and gym pass in the signature waistband pocket.
